body_html: I wonder if resource unavailable in your case is caused by too much memory. You can try disabling checkpoint writing and summary writing services to see if that helps. MonitoredTrainingSession and MonitoredSession are documented in comments right now in implementation file, main difference is that MonitoredTrainingSession is for distributed training with chief worker.

MonitoredTrainingSession and MonitoredSession are documented in comments right now in implementation file, main difference is that MonitoredTrainingSession is for distributed training with chief worker.
body: I wonder if resource unavailable in your case is caused by too much memory. You can try disabling checkpoint writing and summary writing services to see if that helps. MonitoredTrainingSession and MonitoredSession are documented in comments right now in implementation file, main difference is that MonitoredTrainingSession is for distributed training with chief worker.
